New Records: Zac Gallen struck out a season-best 11 in six innings.
D-backs pitchers combined for a season-high 17 strikeouts.
Key Match Events: Zac Gallen struck out 11 in six innings.
Pavin Smith hit a three-run homer.
Arizona Diamondbacks recorded an 8-2 victory over the San Francisco Giants.
Geraldo Perdomo had two hits and a walk.
Christian Walker added two hits and two runs.
Gabriel Moreno drove in two runs.
Heliot Ramos had two hits and an RBI for the Giants.
Mason Black gave up four runs and five hits over 2 2/3 innings.
Smith hit a three-run homer in the eighth inning.
Tyler Fitzgerald’s RBI double scored for the Giants.
Jake McCarthy’s infield single and three walks boosted the lead.
Moreno walked with the bases loaded to force in a run.
Ketel Marte, Joc Pederson, and Walker hit consecutive one-out singles.
Mike Yastrzemski led off the eighth inning with a double.
Ramos followed with an RBI hit.
A.J. Puk struck out two hitters to end the eighth inning.
